name: silence-remover
title: Silence Remover
description: Remove silent parts from audio and video files
content:
Overview

This application automatically removes silent parts from audio and video files, making recordings more concise. Built using pydub for audio detection and MoviePy for video processing.

Features

  • Automatic silence detection and removal
  • Works with both audio and video files
  • Configurable silence threshold and duration
  • Shows time saved and compression percentage

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload audio or video file from stash
  • Silence Threshold: Audio level in dBFS below which is considered silence
  • Minimum Silence Duration: Only remove silences longer than this duration
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a processed file with '_nosilence' suffix added to the original filename.

Use Cases

  • Removing pauses from podcast recordings
  • Compressing lecture or presentation videos
  • Cleaning up interview recordings
  • Reducing file size by removing dead air
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && sudo apt-get update && sudo sudo apt-get install -y ffmpeg && python "prod_apps/python/silence_remover.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -t "${threshold}" -m "${minSilence}"
